entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
